## File Difference

Reviewing the configuration changes in src/config.rs:

- New configuration structure looks clean
- Validation logic is well implemented
- Consider adding more comprehensive error messages

# QC Notification

@developer

## Metadata
current commit: 456def789abc012345678901234567890123cdef
previous commit: 123abc456def789012345678901234567890abcd

Agreed with @reviewer1's feedback. Additionally:

- The new config format is much more intuitive
- Migration path from old config is well handled
- Tests coverage looks comprehensive

# QC Approve

## Note

Thank you both @reviewer1 @reviewer2 for the thorough review!

I've implemented all suggested improvements:

✅ Enhanced error messages with detailed context
✅ Added backward compatibility warnings
✅ Expanded test suite with edge cases
✅ Updated documentation with migration guide

The configuration system is now ready for production use.
